text: oh, my. president siebert, i don't mean to be an alarmist, but difficulty initiating a urine stream could be a symptom of benign prostatic hyperplasia. if you're interested, i can send you a link to a youtube video that'll show you how to perform your own rectal exam. yeah, uh, helpful hint, trim your nails first.
